Titles.jpn: 劇場版 NARUTO -ナルト- 疾風伝

Summaries.eng: The film opens with a prediction that Naruto Uzumaki dies battling a monster who kills him. A funeral is held for Naruto at his home village, where others attend. Tsunade (Naruto) looks out at the window and ponders if everything is just decided by fate.
